members.name: Red Hot Mama's
members.slug: Fresh, local, organic Mexican food! Specializing in tacos, burritos, salads, fresh house made juices and drinks

members.name: Oceanfront Sotheby's Realty
members.slug: Oceanfront Sotheby’s International Realty has a team of highly trained sales associates who are passionate about providing the highest levels of service. How may we assist you?

members.name: Neighbors Cafe
members.slug: Our all-day café, market and communal gathering spot for guests and locals. Catch up with cold-pressed juices, kombucha and wellness shots, (thanks to our friends at Kaua’i Juice Co), recharge with barista-brewed local coffee from Hanalei Coffee Roasters or linger over a nutrient-rich breakfast of chia parfaits, overnight oats, housemade pastries, sustainable salads.

members.name: Lotus Garden Chinese & Thai Cuisine
members.slug: Small, casual dining experience with freshly made food using local ingredients.

members.name: The Cliffs At Princeville
members.slug: On a bluff overlooking the Pacific on Kauai's north shore, this polished condo resort is a 10-minute drive from the Hanalei National Wildlife Refuge and 2 miles from Princeville Golf Club.

members.name: Wai'oli Mission House
members.slug: Embark on a guided tour that tells a great story about life life as a missionary in Hawaii more than 100 years ago. The house is kept clean and faithful to its original form including the garden that is well maintained and produces fruits and vegetables using techniques that were in use historically.

members.name: Limahuli National Tropical Botanical Garden
members.slug: Botanic garden overlooking the Pacific Ocean featuring collections of native & introduced plants.
